desc: Data common to all mobs that can breed

InLove.desc: Number of ticks until the mob stops searching for a mate.

Age.desc: Age of the mob in ticks. Negative when a baby. When above 0, represents number of ticks until the mob can breed again.

ForcedAge.desc: A value of age which will be assigned to this mob when it grows up. Incremented when a baby mob is fed.

LoveCauseLeast.desc: Least significant bits of the entity that caused this animal to breed.

LoveCauseMost.desc: Most significant bits of the entity that caused this animal to breed.
